pages.text: 100|10|Va on ci dar sinahost, [hama] oşkor gardad
100|11|Jaqinan, dar on rūz Parvardigoraşon ʙa [vaz'u holi] eşon komilan ogoh ast
101|1|[On] Furukūʙanda
101|2|[On] Furukūʙanda cist
101|3|Va tu ci donī, ki [on] furukūʙanda cist
101|4|Rūze, ki mardum monandi parvonahoi parokanda [hajronu sargardon] xohand ʙud
101|5|Va kūhho monandi paşmi rangini halloçişuda (zadaşuda) xohand şud
101|6|Va ammo har kase, ki [dar on rūz] pallai mizonaş sangin ʙoşad
101|7|[Dar ʙihişt] Dar zindagii rohatʙaxş xohad ʙud
101|8|Va ammo har kas, ki pallai mizonaş saʙuk ʙoşad
101|9|Pas, [maskanu] panohgohaş «hovija» ast
101|10|Va tu ci donī, ki on [hovija] cist
101|11|Otaşe ast sūzon [va şu'lavar]
102|1|Zijodaxohī şumoro ʙa xud maşƣul [va az jodi Parvardigor ƣofil] soxt
102|2|To [pojoni] koraton ʙa guriston rasid
102|3|Hargiz cunin nest [ki şumo mepindored]; ʙa zudī xohed donist
102|4|Boz [ham] cunin nest; ʙa zudī xohed donist
102|5|Cunin nest [ki şumo gumon mekuned]; agar ʙa donişi jaqinī [va tardidnopazir haqiqati qijomatro] medonisted, [az zijodaxohī va iftixor ʙa amvolu farzandonaton dast ʙarmedoşted]
102|6|Savgand, ki duzaxro xohed did
102|7|Boz ham savgand, ki onro ʙo caşmi jaqin xohed did
102|8|On goh, hatman, dar rūzi qijomat az [tamomi] ne'matho ʙozxost xohed şud
